title: I'm Dating a Psychopath
description: When a new serial killer arises in her city, Finn suspects that he may be related to her past. Against her better judgement, she decides to pursue him in hopes of finding answers—Wanna know more? Click 'Read on Webtoon' button.

title: Getting It Straight!
description: Fiona Pearce is the kind of girl who can never say no to anyone. As long as she can do something to help out, she'll do it in a heartbeat. So when her father faces a problem and asks for her help to find her missing brother—Wanna know more? Click 'Read on Webtoon' button.

title: Two Suns Apart
description: Seren loved Adam for as long as she could remember. He was her first heartbreak, the boy who never looked her way. Years later, fate brings them back together… And for the first time, Adam finally sees her—Wanna know more? Click 'Read on Webtoon' button.
